page.title: 08 Richardsons Trailers
page.content: Richardsons make trailers,it is a family business and it is run by Mr Richardson and his brother.It was started in 1946 and Mr Richardson and his brother moved to Shipton in 1954. The trailers they make carry livestock farming machinery,cars, televison cameras,furniture and even hot air balloons.They used to use wood but now they use steel.To produce the trailers the men first cut the steel and then they make the frame.Then they weld the frame together,and then put the steel on the bottom of the frame to make the floor.After that they put the steel on the body of the frame,and then put the wheels on.Then they spray paint on the trailer.The company employs 20 workers only 4 of them live in Shipton.He also has a secretary.
